# Rishi's Bay

> A personal blog documenting thoughts, experiences, and learnings on technology, product management, AI, and MBA journey. This website serves as a platform to improve writing skills while sharing insights and reflections.

## About the Author

- **Name:** Rishi Kashyap
- **Email:** rishi38199@gmail.com
- **LinkedIn:** https://www.linkedin.com/in/rishikashyap01/

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://kolli.vercel.app/): Welcome page with blog reflections
- [About](https://kolli.vercel.app/about.html): Information about the author and blog purpose

## Blog Categories

- **AI:** Thoughts and insights on artificial intelligence, large language models, and AI technology
- **Product Management:** Experiences and learnings in product management
- **MBA:** Journey and guidance on MBA application process
- **General:** Miscellaneous topics including IELTS preparation and other experiences
- **Welcome:** Introduction to the blog

## Resources

- **RSS Feed:** https://kolli.vercel.app/feed.xml
- **Sitemap:** https://kolli.vercel.app/sitemap.xml

## Blog Posts

Recent posts covering topics on:
- AI and Large Language Models (LLMs)
- Product Management experiences
- MBA application process and guidance
- IELTS test preparation
- Technology and career development

## Content Focus

This blog covers:
- Product management insights and experiences
- AI technology trends and observations
- MBA application process and business education
- Personal development and career growth
- Technology, UX, and product thinking
